definition: the latter part of the day, the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall
details:
noun
- the latter part of the day, the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall
= example: the latter part of the day, the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall
= synonyms: eve
- the early part of night (from dinner until bedtime) spent in a special way
= example: the early part of night (from dinner until bedtime) spent in a special way
- a later concluding time period
= example: a later concluding time period
